name: Grow Out
description:
Grow Out is a pinball game with flowers!

Aim and hit the glowing pots to grow plants and get to the top! Collect points, avoid obstacles and fight with the time. Many great levels await you!

Game made for the 24 hour Huuuge Game Jam 2022, work in progress.

  • KongoPL: https://github.com/KongoPL
  • Grzybojad
  • Jumbocube: https://www.instagram.com/jumbocubee/
